title: Trump on Savannah Guthrie’s missing mom
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he'll call Savannah Guthrie about her mother, who was reported missing.

title: Trump to call Savannah Guthrie over disappearance of her mother Nancy
shortDescription: Trump said the disappearance of Savannah Guthrie's mother, 84-year-old Nancy Guthrie, was "terrible" and revealed he plans to call the news anchor.

title: Trump's commerce secretary invited Epstein to Clinton fundraiser
shortDescription: New documents reveal Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick invited Jeffrey Epstein to a 2015 Hillary Clinton fundraiser.

title: Democrat's romp in Texas race a 'wake-up call' for Republicans
shortDescription: A state Senate election in Texas produced the largest shockwave yet from a slew of special elections in which Democrats have vastly overperformed.

title: House passes bill to end partial shutdown
shortDescription: The House of Representatives passed a bill to end the partial government shutdown. It will go to President Donald Trump's desk for his signature.

title: Jill Biden's ex-husband arrested in murder investigation
shortDescription: Jill Biden's ex-husband, William “Bill” Stevenson, has been indicted on first‑degree murder charges in the December death of his wife, Linda Stevenson.

title: Trump urges GOP to nationalize elections. What does that mean?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said Republicans should nationalize elections. While he didn't elaborate, it would be a departure from the state-run system.

title: GOP turmoil threatened funding bill, but only one Republican voted no
shortDescription: Only one Republican ultimately voted against advancing a government funding bill, which moved ahead on a 217-215 vote.

title: Bill and Hillary Clinton set dates to testify about Jeffrey Epstein
shortDescription: Bill and Hillary Clinton reached agreements with a House committee to testify in late February about accused sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Is Colombia's cocaine Trump's next target after Venezuela?
shortDescription: Trump has accused Colombia's president, Gustavo Petro, of being in league with the cartels, and suggested the Latin America country could be next.

title: Senator Kelly to ask judge to block Trump's 'retribution' campaign
shortDescription: Kelly will ask a federal judge to block the Pentagon's proceedings to demote his rank because he urged troops to reject unlawful orders.

title: See Arizona Senator Mark Kelly's career from NASA to Congress
shortDescription: Before he found himself a target of the Trump administration as a U.S. senator, Mark Kelly was a veteran NASA astronaut. See his career.

title: Jill Biden's ex-husband arrested in wife's murder case
shortDescription: William Stevenson, former husband of first lady Jill Biden, has been arrested and indicted on first-degree murder charges in connection with the December killing of his wife, Linda Stevenson.

title: ¿Puede Trump tomar control del voto? Constitución y poder electoral en juego
shortDescription: Trump propone “nacionalizar” las elecciones en hasta 15 lugares, pese a límites constitucionales y sin pruebas de fraude electoral en 2020.

title: LA mayor urges White House to ensure safety of World Cup fans
shortDescription: Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass said on Wednesday (January 28) that the White House must take the lead in assuring international visitors and local fans of their safety during the upcoming World Cup and 2028 Olympics.

title: Trump urges Republicans to 'nationalize' elections
shortDescription: In an appearance on The Dan Bongino Show, President Donald Trump called on Republicans to seize control of elections from the states.

title: Partial shutdown ends after Trump signs funding package. Recap
shortDescription: The House of Representatives passed a government funding package to end the partial shutdown over DHS reforms.

title: Trump distances himself from Texas loss. What is his approval rating?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he had nothing to do with the special election in Texas where a red seat was flipped blue. What is his approval rating?

title: Judge blocks Trump administration from ending legal protections for Haitians
shortDescription: The ruling says the termination of TPS is "null, void and of no legal effect" and will not impact the work authorization of Haitian immigrants.

title: Trump's new border barrier rises like a 'wall' in the Rio Grande
shortDescription: The string of orange buoys mimics an earlier effort by Texas Gov. Greg Abbott to wall off the Rio Grande.

title: Bill and Hillary Clinton agree to House depositions on Jeffrey Epstein
shortDescription: Former President Bill Clinton and wife, former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton, agreed to testify to a House committee about Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Trump says he won't demolish Kennedy Center in $200 million rebuild
shortDescription: "I’m not ripping it down," Trump said of the Kennedy Center. "I’ll be using the steel. So we’re using the structure. We’re using some of the marble."
